attributes.name: Adrenaline Rush
attributes.description: Stamina regenerates 10 times faster for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Ahzidal's Genius
attributes.description: Increases your Enchanting skill by 10 points.

attributes.name: Ancestor's Wrath
attributes.description: Opponents that get too close take 8 points per second of fire damage for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Bardic Knowledge
attributes.description: Summons a spectral drum that plays for 300 seconds, improving Stamina Regen for you and nearby allies.

attributes.name: Bats
attributes.description: Allows the Dragonborn to turn into a cloud of bats then flies forward several feet before reforming as a Vampire Lord. It can be activated twice in quick succession, but then requires a 20-second cooldown.

attributes.name: Battle Cry
attributes.description: Nearby enemies are Afraid for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Beast Form
attributes.description: Take on the Form of the Wolf.

attributes.name: Berserker Rage
attributes.description: Take half damage and deal double damage for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Black Market
attributes.description: Summons a Dremora merchant for 15 seconds.

attributes.name: Blessing of Azura
attributes.description: Resist 10% of magic.

attributes.name: Blessing of Boethiah
attributes.description: One-handed weapons do 10% more damage.

attributes.name: Blessing of Mephala
attributes.description: Prices are 10% better.

attributes.name: Blessing of the Stag Prince
attributes.description: 5 Health and Stamina while Bow of the Stag Prince is equipped; however, the benefits increase as more animals are killed using the bow.

attributes.name: Bones of the Earth
attributes.description: Caster ignores 80% of all physical damage for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Breath of Nchuak
attributes.description: Draws upon stamina to release a scorching blast of steam that deals 15 points of damage per second.

attributes.name: Command Animal
attributes.description: Make an animal an ally for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Companion's Insight
attributes.source: Black Book: The Winds of Change
attributes.description: Your attacks, shouts, and destruction spells do no damage to your followers.

attributes.name: Conjure Werebear
attributes.description: Summons a Werebear for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

attributes.name: Detect All Creatures
attributes.description: Similar to the Aura Whisper shout and a combination of Detect Life and Detect Dead spells. Sends out a sonar-like pulse that reveals all forms of living and undead undead creatures in a white aura for a few seconds. It also reveals the location of corpses. Cooldown takes 3 seconds.

attributes.name: Detect Ash Source
attributes.description: When close enough, identifies the source of the ash spawn attacks on Tel Mithryn.

attributes.name: Dragonborn Flame
attributes.description: When your Fire Breath Shout kills an enemy, a fire wyrm emerges from the corpse to fight for you for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Dragonborn Force
attributes.description: Your Unrelenting Force Shout does more damage and may disintegrate enemies.

attributes.name: Dragonborn Frost
attributes.description: Your Frost Breath Shout encases foes in ice.

attributes.name: Dragonskin
attributes.description: Absorb 50% of Magicka from hostile spells for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Embrace of Shadows
attributes.description: Vampire is invisible and has improved night vision for 180 seconds.

attributes.name: Frostmoon Bloodlust
attributes.description: While in Beast Form, your attacks do 50% more damage, but you also take 50% more damage.

attributes.name: Frostmoon Howl
attributes.description: Increases the duration of your Howls by 25%.

attributes.name: Frostmoon Instinct
attributes.description: When you enter Beast Form, the world around you seems to slow for 20 seconds.

attributes.name: Frostmoon Predator
attributes.description: While in Beast Form, your health regenerates.

attributes.name: Highborn
attributes.description: Regenerate 25% of your magicka each second for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Histskin
attributes.description: Invoke the power of the Hist to recover health 10 times faster for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Lover's Insight
attributes.source: Black Book: The Winds of Change
attributes.description: Do 10% more damage and get 10% better prices from people of the opposite sex.

attributes.name: Mist Form
attributes.description: Transforms the Dragonborn into an invulnerable cloud of mist for 23 seconds. During this time, health, magicka, and stamina regenerate. The invulnerability effect is similar to the Become Ethereal shout in that even fall damage is negated. Cooldown takes 33 seconds.

attributes.name: Mora's Agony
attributes.description: Summons a field of writhing tentacles that poisons foes.

attributes.name: Mora's Boon
attributes.description: Fully restores your Health, Magicka and Stamina.

attributes.name: Mora's Grasp
attributes.description: Freezes the target between Oblivion and Tamriel for 30 seconds, making them immune to all damage.

attributes.name: Neloth's Health Boost
attributes.description: Neloth's 25 point health boost; health is permanently lowered 25 points after swimming or being in the rain.

attributes.name: Neloth's Memory Spell
attributes.description: Records memories of your experiences for Neloth.

attributes.name: Night Eye
attributes.description: Improved night vision for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Nightingale Strife
attributes.description: Instantly absorb 100 points of Health from the target.

attributes.name: Nightingale Subterfuge
attributes.description: People and creatures in the spell's area of effect will attack anyone nearby for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: North Wind
attributes.description: Targets take 20 points of frost damage for 10 seconds, plus Stamina damage.

attributes.name: Revert Form
attributes.description: Used to turn the Dragonborn from the form of Vampire Lord back to the form of their default race.

attributes.name: Ring of Hircine
attributes.description: Allows for unlimited Werewolf transformations per day

attributes.name: Root of Power
attributes.description: All spells cost 75% less to cast for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Scholar's Insight
attributes.source: Black Book: The Winds of Change
attributes.description: Reading Skill Books gives you an extra Skill Point.

attributes.name: Secret Servant
attributes.description: Summons a Dremora butler for 15 seconds to carry your excess items.

attributes.name: Secret of Arcana
attributes.description: Spells cost no Magicka for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Secret of Protection
attributes.description: You take half damage for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Secret of Strength
attributes.description: Power attacks cost no Stamina for 30 seconds.

attributes.name: Seeker of Might
attributes.description: Combat skills are 10% more effective.

attributes.name: Seeker of Shadows
attributes.description: Stealth skills are all 10% more effective.

attributes.name: Seeker of Sorcery
attributes.description: All spells cost 10% less magicka. Enchantments are 10% more powerful.

attributes.name: Shadowcloak of Nocturnal
attributes.description: For 120 seconds you automatically become invisible while sneaking.

attributes.name: Summon Arniel's Shade
attributes.description: Summons the Shade of Arniel Gane for 60 seconds wherever the caster is pointing.

attributes.name: Summon Karstaag
attributes.description: Summon Karstaag to fight for you for 120 seconds. You may only use this ability 3 times, and only while outdoors.

attributes.name: Summon Spectral Assassin
attributes.description: Summons the ghost of the legendary assassin Lucien Lachance to fight by your side, until he's defeated.

attributes.name: Sun Flare
attributes.description: A 100 point fiery explosion centered on the caster. Does more damage to closer targets.

attributes.name: Supernatural Reflexes
attributes.description: When activated, time grinds to a near halt for 23 seconds, but the Dragonborn won't be affected as much by the disparity. Cooldown takes 45 seconds. Works similar to the Slow Time shout.

attributes.name: The Ritual Stone
attributes.description: Raise all nearby dead enemies to fight for you.

attributes.name: The Serpent Stone
attributes.description: Paralyze target for 5 seconds. +25 points damage

attributes.name: The Shadow Stone
attributes.description: Become invisible for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: The Tower Stone
attributes.description: Unlock any Expert or lower-level lock.

attributes.name: Totem of Brotherhood
attributes.description: Summons two wolf spirits to aid in battle.

attributes.name: Totem of Fear
attributes.description: Casts Fear against nearby enemies.

attributes.name: Totem of the Hunt
attributes.description: Casts a Detect Life spell.

attributes.name: Vampire Lord
attributes.description: Take on the form of a Vampire Lord

attributes.name: Vampire Sight
attributes.description: Grants Night Vision for 60 seconds. Identical to Vampire's Sight but used in the form of a Vampire Lord

attributes.name: Vampire's Seduction
attributes.description: Creatures and people up to level 10 won't fight for 30 seconds. Granted after one day of not feeding.

attributes.name: Vampire's Servant
attributes.description: Reanimate a dead body to fight for you for 60 seconds. The strength of the body increases each day the Vampire goes without feeding, progressing from "weak," to "more powerful," to "powerful," and finally to "very powerful" after three full days of not feeding.

attributes.name: Vampire's Sight
attributes.description: Improved night vision for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Voice of the Emperor
attributes.description: Nearby people are Calmed for 60 seconds.

attributes.name: Waters of Life
attributes.description: Heals everyone close to the caster 200 points.
